title: [Gameplay] Intermediate Ziggs bot obtained a blackfire torch in Twisted Treeline
body: in a game of bots TT, with a kalista, jinx, and leona against bots Irelia, Graves, and Ziggs.  Lategame, ziggs bought a blackfire torch.  If this isn't a bug, I apologize, but I was under the impression that those weren't supposed to be in the game anymore?

replies.body:
Hey Knyo! 

Thanks for the report! This is definitely a bug! If you can't buy Blackfire Torch, bots shouldn't be able to either. We'll get this issue resolved.
Nooo, don't torture the Veigar bot any further, he already rarely uses Q :(
